message.jm_server.deletion_failure: Could not delete waypoint on the server
message.jm_server.creation_failure:
Could not create waypoint on the server.
It is recommended to delete the waypoint and try again.
text.config.jmserver-config.title: JourneyMap Server Config
text.config.jmserver-config.option.showA: Whether waypoint creation, deletion or other alerts are shown.
text.config.jmserver-config.option.updat: Frequency of when waypoints are grabbed from the server (in ticks)
